hadiths.text: A'isha reported that Harith b. Hisham asked Allah's Apostle (ﷺ):How does the the wahi (inspiration) come to you? He said: At times it comes to me like the ringing of a bell and that is most severe for me and when it is over I retain that (what I had received in the form of wahi), and at times an Angel in the form of a human being comes to me (and speaks) and I retain whatever he speaks

chapter.ara-name: باب عَرَقِ النَّبِيِّ صلى الله عليه وسلم فِي الْبَرْدِ وَحِينَ يَأْتِيهِ الْوَحْىُ .
chapter.eng-name: The Prophet (ﷺ) Sweated When It Was Cold, And When The Revelation Came To Him
